WorkItem.Description:
When I use one Datagrid on a WPF Window without template columns there is no problem, but if I add another Datagrid or add a template column with a TextBox inside, and I scroll the DataGrid, I can watch values inside the DataGrid changing alleatory.
 
I am using dinamic databinding  from a database this way:
 
                MyDataGrid.DataContext = MyDataTable
 
So, I first get data from the database into an ADO.NET DataTable object, then I bind the DataGrid control.
 
Then I format data inside the DataGrid control this way:
 
MyDataGrid.Columns(2).GetCellContent(MyDataGrid.Items(3)).SetValue(TextBlock.TextProperty, FormatCurrency(MyDataTable.Rows(3)("Total"), 2))
 
In this case, I set the value of third column, fourth row to the value of "Total" column with currency format.
 
Then, when I scroll either of the DataGrid controls, I can watch the values changing alleatory.
WorkItem.Summary: There is a bug when scrolling data on a DataGrid
